Class EventNotifier

java.lang.Object
com.example.ajilore.code.ui.events.EventNotifier
public final class EventNotifier extends Object
EventNotifier Purpose: A class that sends the organizer broadcasts. It writes an audit record under /org_events/{eventId}/broadcasts and fans out inbox items under /org_events/{eventId}/entrants/{uid}/inbox. Pattern: Stateless helper with a simple callback interface.

  • Method Details

    • notifyAudience

      public static void notifyAudience(@NonNull com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db, @NonNull String eventId, @NonNull String eventTitle, @NonNull String message, boolean includePoster, @Nullable String linkUrl, @NonNull String targetStatus, @NonNull EventNotifier.Callback cb)
      Broadcast a message to a whole audience bucket for an event.

      Steps: 1) Create an audit doc in /org_events/{eventId}/broadcasts. 2) Fan out an inbox message to entrants under /org_events/{eventId}/entrants/{uid}/inbox based on status rules.

      Status filter rules: - "waiting": status == waiting - "chosen": status == chosen AND responded != accepted/declined - "selected": (chosen + accepted) OR status == selected - "cancelled": (chosen + declined) OR status == cancelled
      Parameters:
      db - Firestore instance to use
      eventId - Event document ID (org_events/{eventId})
      eventTitle - Title placed into inbox items
      message - Message body to send
      includePoster - Whether the UI should show a poster
      linkUrl - Optional URL to include (nullable)
      targetStatus - Audience: "waiting", "chosen", "selected", or "cancelled"
      cb - Completion callback (success or error)

    • notifySingle

      public static void notifySingle(@NonNull com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db, @NonNull String eventId, @NonNull String eventTitle, @NonNull String uid, @NonNull String targetStatus, @NonNull String message, boolean includePoster, @Nullable String linkUrl, @NonNull EventNotifier.Callback cb)
      Send a broadcast and a single inbox message to one entrant.

      Useful for follow-ups like per-user accept/decline messaging. Writes an audit under broadcasts and one inbox doc under /org_events/{eventId}/entrants/{uid}/inbox.

      Parameters:
      db - Firestore instance to use
      eventId - Event document ID
      eventTitle - Title placed into the inbox item
      uid - Entrant user ID (entrants doc id)
      targetStatus - Label for this message ("selected", "cancelled", etc.)
      message - Message body
      includePoster - Whether the UI should show a poster
      linkUrl - Optional URL to include (nullable)
      cb - Completion callback (success or error)
